body:
Comment 1 by **Metal3d**: 
Note that:
http://play.golang.org/p/9FRGDA4_x5 won't work, I cannot get in function a "Eatable"
struct if I send a derived structure.

cannot use a (type Apple) as type Eatable in function argument

So I need to force Apple to be a Eatable var... but we can't use Eetable(a) in main
func... Eatable is a struct in this example.

So, the problem I show is a complex argument assertion that needs to be explained or
fixed.
